column2: Now that the war for independence is over, we should try to intergrate the rest of our countries' disenfranchised peoples with a congress where everybody can be heard, and a constitution can be crafted.
Now that we've expanded into the Rhine, we should focus on intergrating the local population into the greater Elbian Confederation.
Give Concessions to the G	reeks
Greece has long been a unstable and troubling part of Venice, if we were to give them some concessions and political representation it would go a long way to fully intergrate them.
In our quest for the unification of Ameriga, we have fully incorporated the former lands of Lotharingia. We can now try to persuade the local population to embrace the Amerigan Dream.

Now that we've reclaimed Atlanta and secured our positon as an amerigan power, high spheres of influence are now pushing for further expansion into Amazonie, some are even proposing a federation between them!
In our quest for the unification of Ameriga, we have fully incorporated the former lands of Amazonie. We can now try to persuade the local population to embrace the Amerigan Dream.
The Pan-Boer Dream is attracting immigrants from all over the world!
With control over Venice proper, we are now able to integrate and unite with our Venetian brothers in our quest for a united Italy!
Through integration the literacy of the Pomeranians has increased, but they are not fully integrated yet.
You can never be too educated.
Through integration the literacy of the Rheinish has increased, but they are not fully integrated yet.
You can never be too educated.
The time has come for the Romanian peoples to accept the crown of Hungary.
Proclaim the Grand Duchy of Romania
With the Romanian peoples united under our singular Banner it is time to offically claim dejure rulership over Romania.
The Empire of the North Sea
Now that Ireland has been wrestled away from Anglois dominion we now finally have compelete imperium over the North Sea.
Destroys the province selector building in all provinces in which it has been built within.
With our influence increasing across the steppes and Siberia, the Tartars have started to assimilate into our culture and become closely tied with The Russian Empire, it is time we integrate them.
With our influence increasing across the former region of Sibir and with the Siberian peoples becomely closely affiliated with the Russian people, it is time we integrate them.
With our influence increasing across the region of Eastern Ainu Mosir and with the Yakut peoples becomely closely affiliated with the Russian people, it is time we integrate them.
Re-Establish Islam in the Middle East
Since the Janissaries took power we can propose a policy of Re-establishing the Islamic institution in the Middle East, and hopefully gain the support of the local Arabs!
Declare Ourselves the Leaders of Islam
Now with complete control over Mecca and Medina, the heartland of Islam, aswell as the surrounding territories with little opposition we can finally declare ourselves the leaders of Islam!

It was not until the development of sanitation that the presence of waste and sewage in cities was even considered to be a health issue. Once methods were introduced to remove waste and keep the streets clean, it became possible for rodent infestations to be reduced in size and for cities to rapidly grow.

The invention of modern methods of voluntary birth control are having a profound effect on the national birth rate, as citizens (particularly the wealthy) are able to exert far more control over when and how often they have children.
A vaccine has been developed which should stop the spread of cholera in our country, and which indeed should be a blow against the affliction throughout the world.

The development of antitoxins is an advance that not only allows the medical field to combat poisons, but also to develop and further their understanding of how to kill bacteria and other microorganisms which are responsible for many afflictions.

A cultural shift has begun which assigns to women a lesser status than that of men, even beyond their traditional inability to partake in politics. Common thought is that women are lesser creatures, best suited as chattel and as producers of children.
